reviews.review_msg: Hard work in class  super low grades! Worst teacher! Doesnt give fair grades to deserving students and shell constantly find ways of criticizing you! SFU, please review students feedback on her. People deserve better.
If I've read the reviews on this site before attending her classes, I wouldn't even register for the class. She's horrible in every  sense. Save your time and money.

Very boring lectures, lack of practical examples during class even though it was asked for by students, lack of explanation on how to implement the learned material into work life. The lectures were purely read from the textbook, teacher didn't put in any effort to make class interesting and to actually teach us valuable things for the workplace.
